iterative application development monthly Sprints stand up meetings poker planning sessions elaboration sessions and customer reporting Designed UML diagrams like Use case Class and Activity diagram for fetching the data from topic and makes web service calls to the middle tier Mule ESB for processing Worked on the Mule API Gateway for theapplication of policies to API as well for managing the synchronous and Asynchronous messaging scopes using  in Mule Developed Mule flows to integrate Data from various sources into Database from  topics and queues some transformations were also done at
